title: How to Make Saudi Champagne

steps.headline: Take one apple, orange, and a lemon.
Now, cut them into slices.
steps.description: Make sure its not too thin. It must be as thick as shown in the image below.

steps.headline: Take a Glass Pitcher.
steps.description: Make sure it's transparent, so that the beauty of the champagne can be seen.

steps.headline: Now add the apple, lemon, and orange slices with plenty of mint sprigs.
Then add the Apple juice into it and stir gently.
steps.description: Let it stand for about 15-20 minutes so that the natural taste of orange and apple is added to the drink.

steps.headline: After 20 minutes, add lemonade or 7up to it.
Add ice cubes just before serving.
Eat the sliced fruits.
steps.description: After the liquid has been drunk, eat the fruits to finish off the treat.
